name: Bin Chickanery
description:
Whether you love them or hate them, everyone seems to have an opinion about ibises.

Whilst it's not as common here in WA, ibises in eastern Australia are known to eat out of bins regularly. This is why they are colloquially known as "bin chickens". "Chickanery" means deceit or trickery.

Put the two together and what do you get? A fun platformer where you get to play an ibis who wants to shake up the system and eat some rubbish!

This game was made for the "bird" themed Potluck party.

Find out more about Potluck here:
https://www.facebook.com/PotLvckCo/
https://twitter.com/PotLvckCo

Audrey made the wonderful music for this game - her twitter is below:

Thank you for playing my game and please let me know what you thought of it!
